metadata.name: An Ordinary Morning
metadata.description:
A war breaks out on a morning that was just like any other until it forever splits our lives into "before" and "after". The sound of shattering dreams and aspirations violently stopped mid-ascension, of illusions crushing, of childhood destroyed will echo through generations to come. Sadly, in any armed conflict the most vulnerable and innocent are the ones who suffer the most.

2022

Edition: 1/1
Format: 3d animation
Resolution: 1600x2000 px
Frame rate: 30 fps
